price: Ka ce: "Shin, daga abũbuwan shirkinku akwai wanda yake fãra halitta, sa'an nan kuma ya mayar da ita?" Ka ce: "Allah ne Yake fãra halitta, sa'an nan kuma Ya mayar da ita. To, yãyã akejũyar da ku?"
arabic: قُلۡ هَلۡ مِن شُرَكَآئِكُم مَّن يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥۚ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يَبۡدَؤُاْ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul hal min shurakāikum man yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu quli al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu fa-annā tu'fakūna
